Docs.param: The mapper we are seeing if we can wrap
Docs.summary: This is a utility method used to determine whether can or should be used to wrap . This will not throw, since the desired behavior in the event that it cannot be wrapped, is to just back off to the original "unwrapped" bound mapper.
Docs.returns: Whether we can call with this mapper and expect it to succeed
